channel.title: Climbing for Life on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Climbing for Life on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Tokyo: Junji Sakamoto’s ‘Climbing for Life’ to Open Festival
item.description: The film tells the story of legendary Japanese female mountaineer Junko Tabei and stars Sayuri Yoshinaga.
